mapper.select: select a.rid as "ID" ,-- 唯一主键 b.inhosno as "ZYID" ,--住院号 b.INTIMES as "VisitId" ,--住院次数 a.PATIENT_ID as "PatientId" ,--病例号 a.CRTE_TIME as "EnterDate" , --记录日期 a.UPDT_TIME as "UpdTime" ,--更新日期 '-' as "CaseClass" ,--病历分类 '-' as "BcCode" ,--病历记录编号 '-' as "BcName" ,--病历记录名称 '-' as "CourseContent" --病历内容 from EMR_INPATIENTINFO a,ipr_inpatientinfo b where a.orgcode =b.orgcode and a.visit_id=b.inid and a.orgcode =#{map.OrgCode} and b.inhosno=#{map.ID} and a.crte_time >=to_date(#{map.StartDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.crte_time <=to_date(#{map.EndDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
